jobInfo.postDescription:
Responsibilities:
1. Be able to compile automatic-test plan, design specific test program according to the required documents 
2. To construct and maintain the test environment according to test plan
3. To ensure the quality of the test, carry on test work; hand in test report, including program automatic-test script, record test results completely, program complete test report and other related technical documents.
4. To record and submit the problems during test truthfully 
5. To summary the result of the test and statistical analysis, follow up the test and propose some suggestions about the test. 
6. To provide technical support for business department

Requirements:
1. Be equip with good cross-team communication and coordination ability and team spirit 
2. Be equip with high sense of responsibility and proactive work attitude, good ability of business needs analysis, technical problem analysis ability, strong ability of communication, document ability, self-learning ability 
3. Master C language, be equipped with a good research and development ability, be proficient in reading and writing code 
4. Can read circuit diagram and analysis hardware problem 
5. Familiar with industrial communication buses: CAN, LIN Flexray is a plus
jobInfo.address: 深圳宝安区北方骏亿工业园

brandComInfo.introduce:
法雷奥集团是一家独立的汽车零部件生产厂家，专注于设计，生产和销售供轿车，卡车等使用的系统集成及模块，尤其近年将目标对准消减二氧化碳，是世界知名的综合性部件供应商之一。

法雷奥集团目前共在28个国家，拥有125个生产基地，21个研究中心，39个开发中心及10个销售中心，共有职员67,900人。
法雷奥集团分4个业务部门，共有16种产品领域，提供给OEM市场及售后服务市场。

OEM市场：法雷奥集团向世界各大汽车制造厂家提供全球性零部件供应。
售后服务市场：由法雷奥集团中的法雷奥服务，向售后服务市场提供正品维修部件（OES），以及为了满足市场需求独立开发的维修部件（IAM）。
